metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2868 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
libtiff's tiffcrop utility has a improper input validation flaw that canlead to out of bounds read and ultimately cause a crash if an attacker isable to supply a crafted file to tiffcrop.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiff-tools - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiff5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.6').
